languages.text:
В меню "Управления грузами" вы получите информацию об имеющихся на корабле грузах, их типах и заполненности.
В разделе "Груз" можно получить развернутую информацию о трофеях, упакованных в конкретный груз. Если вам понадобится изъять и использовать трофей из уже упакованного груза, для начала перенесите его обратно в инвентарь.
В скором времени грузы пригодятся вам для обмена с торговцами.

Open the cargo management screen to learn more about the cargo on your flagship: the amount, the types, and the percentage of cargo being filled up.
On the cargo tab, you can see details about the items packed in each cargo slot. If you need to use an item that is already packed, move that item back to your inventory.
Cargo is needed when trading with merchants. You will meet them soon.

В скором времени грузы пригодятся вам для обмена с торговцами.

traits.locale_text:
Open the cargo manager screen to know more about the cargo on your flagship: the amount, the types, and the percentage of being filled up.
On the cargo tab, you can see the details about the items packed into each cargo slot. If you need to use an item which is already packed, move that item back to your inventory.
Cargo is needed when trading with merchants. You will meet them soon.

Cargo is needed when trading with merchants. You will meet them soon.

languages.text:
Consultez l'écran de gestion de la cargaison pour de plus amples informations sur la cargaison de votre vaisseau amiral : quantité embarquée, type de marchandises et taux de remplissage.
Dans l'onglet dédié à la cargaison, vous trouverez la description détaillée des objets stockés à chaque emplacement. Si vous souhaitez utiliser un objet préalablement stocké, il vous suffit de le renvoyer dans votre inventaire.
La cargaison permet de faire du négoce avec les marchands que vous aurez bientôt l'occasion de rencontrer.
languages.original_text:

On the cargo tab, you can see details about the items packed in each cargo slot. If you need to use an item that is already packed, move that item back to your inventory.
Cargo is needed when trading with merchants. You will meet them soon.

Dans l'onglet dédié à la cargaison, vous trouverez la description détaillée des objets stockés à chaque emplacement. Si vous souhaitez utiliser un objet préalablement stocké, il vous suffit de le renvoyer dans votre inventaire.
La cargaison permet de faire du négoce avec les marchands que vous aurez bientôt l'occasion de rencontrer.

languages.text:
Im Bildschirm Frachtverwaltung erfährst du, welche Fracht du in welcher Menge auf deinem Flaggschiff mitführst und welcher Anteil deines Frachtraums bereits belegt ist.
Im Tab Fracht siehst du Details zu den Items, die in den einzelnen Frachtplätzen gelagert sind. Wenn du ein bereits eingelagertes Item nutzen möchtest, verschiebe es zurück in dein Inventar.
Fracht ist nötig, um mit Händlern Handel zu treiben. Du wirst ihnen bald begegnen.
languages.original_text:
Open the cargo management screen to learn more about the cargo on your flagship: the amount, the types, and the percentage of cargo being filled up.
On the cargo tab, you can see details about the items packed in each cargo slot. If you need to use an item that is already packed, move that item back to your inventory.
Cargo is needed when trading with merchants. You will meet them soon.

languages.text:
Abre la pantalla de gestión de carga de tu nave para ver la carga de tu nave en detalle: cantidades, tipos y porcentaje de almacenamiento ocupado.
En la pestaña de carga puedes encontrar los detalles de los objetos almacenados en cada ranura de carga. Si necesitas usar un objeto almacenado, devuélvelo a tu inventario.
Necesitas carga para comerciar con mercaderes. No tardarás en encontrarlos.
languages.original_text:
Open the cargo management screen to learn more about the cargo on your flagship: the amount, the types, and the percentage of cargo being filled up.
On the cargo tab, you can see details about the items packed in each cargo slot. If you need to use an item that is already packed, move that item back to your inventory.
Cargo is needed when trading with merchants. You will meet them soon.

traits.locale_text:
Abre la pantalla de gestión de carga de tu nave para ver la carga de tu nave en detalle: cantidades, tipos y porcentaje de almacenamiento ocupado.
En la pestaña de carga puedes encontrar los detalles de los objetos almacenados en cada ranura de carga. Si necesitas usar un objeto almacenado, devuélvelo a tu inventario.
Necesitas carga para comerciar con mercaderes. No tardarás en encontrarlos.

languages.text:
貨物管理画面を開くと、旗艦に積まれている貨物の量、種類、内容の補充率などの詳細が表示される。
貨物タブでは、各貨物スロットに梱包中のアイテムの詳細を見ることができる。すでに梱包済みのアイテムを使用したい場合は、そのアイテムをインベントリに戻せばいい。
商人と取引する際は貨物が必要だ。近いうちに商人と会えるだろう。
languages.original_text:
Open the cargo management screen to learn more about the cargo on your flagship: the amount, the types, and the percentage of cargo being filled up.
On the cargo tab, you can see details about the items packed in each cargo slot. If you need to use an item that is already packed, move that item back to your inventory.
Cargo is needed when trading with merchants. You will meet them soon.

traits.locale_text:
貨物管理画面を開くと、旗艦に積まれている貨物の量、種類、内容の補充率などの詳細が表示される。
貨物タブでは、各貨物スロットに梱包中のアイテムの詳細を見ることができる。すでに梱包済みのアイテムを使用したい場合は、そのアイテムをインベントリに戻すといい。
商人と取引する際は貨物が必要だ。そのうち商人に会えるだろう。

languages.text:
打开货舱管理界面，即可了解旗舰上货物的信息，详细查看货物的数量、类型，以及货物占满的百分比。
您可以通过“货舱”选项，看到每个货舱栏位内物品的详细信息。如果您需要使用已经放入货舱内的物品，您需要先将其移回物品栏中。
货物可在与商人交易时使用，您很快就会与商人见面了。
languages.original_text:
Open the cargo management screen to learn more about the cargo on your flagship: the amount, the types, and the percentage of cargo being filled up.
On the cargo tab, you can see details about the items packed in each cargo slot. If you need to use an item that is already packed, move that item back to your inventory.
Cargo is needed when trading with merchants. You will meet them soon.

traits.locale_text:

您可以通过“货舱”选项，看到每个货舱栏位内物品的详细信息。如果您需要使用已经放入货舱内的物品，您需要先将其移回物品栏中。
货物可在与商人交易时使用，您很快就会与商人见面了。

languages.text:
Sancak gemindeki kargoların miktarı, türleri ve dolulukları hakkında bilgi edinmek için kargo yönetimi ekranını aç.
Kargo sekmesinden, paketlenip kargo yuvalarına yerleştirilen eşyalara dair ayrıntılara ulaşabilirsin. Paketlenmiş bir eşyayı kullanman gerekirse o eşyayı envanterine geri taşı.
Kargo, tüccarla ticaret yaparken kullanılır. Bu tüccarlarla yakında karşılaşacaksın.
languages.original_text:
Open the cargo management screen to learn more about the cargo on your flagship: the amount, the types, and the percentage of cargo being filled up.
On the cargo tab, you can see details about the items packed in each cargo slot. If you need to use an item that is already packed, move that item back to your inventory.
Cargo is needed when trading with merchants. You will meet them soon.
